name: Dodge This! (Arsalaan)
description:
Dodge this! brings in the arcade fun which doesn't just make this a good time pass but also tests your reflexes. Its fun and doesn't require more than one finger to play.

➢ Simple Controls :

  • Swipe left to move left
  • Swipe right to move right

➢ One Goal : Avoid getting hit by red blocks and reach the top!

Pro Tip : Dodge enough obstacles and become immortal for a few seconds and see what happens when an enemy touches you.

➢ Leaderboard : Check your global ranking. Can you score enough to be in the top 50?

➢ More game modes to be added soon!
